item.title: A Little White Die
item.description:
Welcome to the devlog for my game A Little White Die.

This project is part of a series of games called The Luck Legends. Visit the devlog for the entire series if you just want a “summary” of the development behind this game. This article will be about the in-depth specifics, which problems I encountered, how I solved them, and any other interesting bits.

item.title: The Luck Legends
item.description:
Welcome to the devlog for my project called The Luck Legends.

As usual, this project contains multiple games that all revolve around the same core mechanic or idea that I came up with. This general devlog talks about the general approach, with a summary about how each game came to be. For more details, it links to the actual full devlog of each particular game.
